name: KIRU
description:
"Dear Bonsai Lover,

Please take care of our little friend we would like to see him at the next bonsai championship.

It's an unique tree, growing quite fast.
Be sure he has enough leaves but not too many!
Keep it balanced to gain points and dont let things go out of control!

This is how you take care of our little friend:

- Click on branches to trim them

-  Use A & D to rotate the camera

Your bonsai will be judged on the BONSCORE, the more branches you have the more points you get, but be careful: Once your Bonsai is out of control it cant be judged anymore.

Thank you"

Made with Unity.

Submission for the GMTK JAM - OUT OF CONTROL

SourceCode: https://github.com/Assertores/Kiru


ART

Jakob Lücking @Jaxxcifer
